text.section: The State Board shall meet not less than once every 3 months and more frequently on the call of the chair.

A member of the State Board:
may not receive compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
The State Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
